pages.text: Contracts are otherworldly pacts purchased from Demons.$(br2)They can be signed with a Taglock, after which using it will apply its conditions on whoever "signed" it.$(br2)While most contracts are usually signed in self-interest, some, like $(l:bewitchment:contracts/death)Death, are best used on other people.

Contracts last seven days.$(br2)Always keep in mind that contracts, as demonic things do, are usually two sided, and will affect whoever signed them or forced them.$(br2)Maybe attaining someone's favor could negate that.
